description.1: Worked with a team to create a repository of cuban scientific publications.
description.2: Created a Python script for better researcher identification using data from sources such as ORCID and LDAP protocol.
description.3: Proposed and implemented the migration of older versions of Angular to the latest, reducing production bundle sizes and loading times.
description.4: Performed quality assurance tests on various sites to ensure cross‑browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness.

description.1: Engineered and maintained high-performance production code across multiple projects for clients including Tek-Task, The Dopple, Modwell, and FCBC, utilizing modern frameworks such as React and Next.js, resulting in robust, scalable solutions that exceeded client expectations.

description.3: Optimized user interfaces by applying intuitive design principles, ensuring seamless functionality and improved user satisfaction, driving higher user retention and engagement rates across projects.

description.3: Adapted to changing project demands by embracing collaborative problem-solving, contributing to the successful achievement of critical project milestones.
